thread.title: Lourdes launches $5 million renovation to emergency area. See what else is under construction in Lafayette Parish.
thread.title_full: Lourdes launches $5 million renovation to emergency area. See what else is under construction in Lafayette Parish.

author: Adam Daigle
title: Lourdes launches $5 million renovation to emergency area. See what else is under construction in Lafayette Parish.
text:
Building permits for the cities of Lafayette, Broussard, Youngsville and Scott for Dec. 24 to Jan. 7:
Commercial alterations
MEDICAL: 4801 Ambassador Caffery Parkway, description, renovation and addition to second-floor emergency department at Our Lady of Lourdes Regional Medical Center; applicant, Moliere Chappuis Architects; contractor, Kent Design Build; $5 million.
SCHOOL: 202 Rue Iberville, description, wall and door addition at Lafayette Parish School System office; applicant, Ziler Architects; contractor, Castle Row Construction; $5,000.
MEDICAL: 902 Coolidge St., description, renovation of existing building at Ochsner Lafayette General Medical Center physical therapy office; applicant, AQ Studios; contractor, Fremin General Contractors; $1.96 million.
New commercial
MEDICAL: 111 Republic Ave., description, design and construction of 30,800-square-foot, 32-bed physical rehabilitation hospital; applicant, AQ Studios; contractor, Kent Design Build; $9.7 million.
